title: Heterobimetallic Ta–Nb MOF offering moderate Lewis/Brønsted acidity expedites glucose isomerization to fructose under microwave conditions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01331J, Paper
Sangeeta Mahala, Bhawana Devi, Meera Cheviri, Senthil Murugan Arumugam, Balamurugan Arumugam, Lakshmanan Potturaja, Vishnu Bakthavachalam, Joy K. Roy, Sasikumar Elumalai
The heterobimetallic MOF with anchored sulfonic acid groups (functioning as a bridge between Ta and Nb metal nodes) enables rapid and augmented glucose isomerization to fructose for bioenergy development.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
